snippet.title: Hoppin' John Holiday Appetizer Dip
snippet.description: Posted by: Joe_LoCiceroI think it's never too soon to get the kids in on enjoying appetizers: understanding the manners that are involved in eating them, and getting to know their place in a meal's line-up. During this ...

snippet.title: Beet Walnut Dip
snippet.description: Dipping can be a great way to introduce your kids to a food they are suspicious of. Partly it's because everything tastes good on a chip, and partly it's because dips are usually seductively salty and tangy and flavorfu...

snippet.title: Cheesy Spinach and Artichoke Dip
snippet.description: Cheesy Spinach and Artichoke Dip is a must-have appetizer at any get-together. Get Anne Coleman's recipe for this classic warm dip here.

snippet.title: Appetizer Recipes
snippet.description: Learn these Easy Appetizer Recipes that will help make your next Party the talk of the town.

snippet.title: Asparagus with Delicious Dip
snippet.description: This recipe for super-fresh asparagus brings out its mellow sweetness, along with a delicious mayo, lemon, garlic and chipotle dip. A perfect veggie dish for an appetizer or side.

snippet.title: Zuke-A-Ganoush Dip
snippet.description: I am a fan of eating dip for dinner, or packing it up for a school lunch. Because that's how it is around here. And I don't mean that bacon-horseradish dip and Ruffles makes a perfectly fine meal, although, yum. But hum...

snippet.title: White Bean Dip
snippet.description: Inexpensive, nearly instantaneous, and deliciously wholesome, White Bean Dip is a creamy, tasty alternative to hummus or pinto bean dips.

snippet.title: Black Bean Dip
snippet.description: Here's an easy dip to try. For these small and nearly-instant recipes, I use canned beans, and find them perfectly thrifty, happily quick, and acceptably tasty. However, if I'm using a lot of beans -- in a soup, say -- ...
